description: Chris Ward, Simon Cox with his ebony body, Matt McGrath with hisfantastically furry chest, Eli Horst (who became 2004 IML Boot BlackWinner), Scott Samson with his GQ face, Harley Mancuso with histattooed, Colt-Quality body, Justin Southwell with his huge, bloatedcock, Mitchel James with his latin smile, and Logan Gray with hisdelicious grey beard! title: Punishment Chamber, Scene #04
